/* eslint-disable indent */import sessionMgr from'js/sessionManager.service';import routeChangeHandler from'js/routeChangeHandler';/**
 * This is the uiJs layer route/state contribution.
 *
 * @module js/ui.states
 */var contribution={// route to deal with handling checks for authentication.
checkAuthentication:{view:'Login',noAuth:true,resolve:[{token:'authenticator',resolveFn:()=>{return routeChangeHandler.pickAuthenticator().then(authenticator=>{if(authenticator){sessionMgr.resetPipeLine();authenticator.authenticate().then(function(){sessionMgr.authenticationSuccessful();});}});}}]}};/**
 * @param {String} key - The key
 * @param {Promise} deferred - Promise
 * @returns {Object} contribution
 */export default function(key,deferred){if(key==='states'){if(deferred){deferred.resolve(contribution);}else{return contribution;}}else{if(deferred){deferred.resolve();}}}
